Reviews.Title: cell phone i own
Reviews.Author: renay wright
Reviews.Content: the product arrived on time in a great package with no damage. everything was included and i am well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: janice taylor
Reviews.Content: dont buy this phone boost does not use this phone no more.,so who ever asks you to buy this motorola i412 dont

Reviews.Title: was shipped wrong phone
Reviews.Author: Lucille Wood
Reviews.Content: on this phone this was the one I wanted as picture shows s blue flip @ I received a slide up phone is there anything that can be done . the slide up phone needa a sims card & no one has it.

Reviews.Title: Epic Fail
Reviews.Author: Kalikat88
Reviews.Content: Bought it and it didnt get service where i lived. The company wouldnt take back the phone because i had already opened it. HOW WAS I SUPPOSED TO KNOW IF I DIDNT GET SERVICE IF I DIDNT OPEN THE PHONE?!?!? Worst company policy ever!

ProductInfo.Features:
Easily pocketable clamshell phone from Boost Mobile with nationwide walkie-talkie access
Choose from Monthly Unlimited or $2 Daily Unlimited plans with unlimited talk, text, e-mail, and web
GPS for navigation; Bluetooth and speakerphone for hands-free communication; access to text and instant messaging
Up to 3.4 hours of talk time; released in May, 2011
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola  i412 Prepaid Phone (Boost Mobile)
